WorkItem.Description: typecheck/SemanticDiagnostic.ts should be renamed to typecheck/semanticDiagnostic.ts. It is currently breaking the build on case-sensitive file systems (Linux/OSX). Renaming it (and the reference in the jakefile) fixes the build.

Comments.Message: Looks like there is already a [pull request](https://typescript.codeplex.com/SourceControl/network/forks/mihailik/CamelCasingForSemanticDiagnosticTS/contribution/4946#!/tab/comments) for this that has been sitting for awhile - can this be merged in?
